name: DE-PLATFORMER (Big Impact Final)
description:
A game about content moderation & algorithms on social media. You play as a manual content reviewer with a simple choice: approve a post, and it's deleted. Deny the post, and it returns to the AI for further review. You'll only have 10 seconds to make that decision -- so use all the clues at your disposal to correctly identify the right content. 

It gets a little weird.

made in twine sugarcube 2.4 w/ html css and javascript for PIC big impact @ pratt institute
